definition: one bedroom and one living room
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: Hi, I want to rent an apartment with one bedroom and one living room in the NTU area.
sentences.chinese: 你好，我想在臺大附近租間一房一廳的房子。

sentences.english: I'd like to rent either a studio or a one-bedroom apartment.
sentences.chinese: 我想租一間小套房或是一房一廳的公寓。

sentences.english: I want to rent a flatlet or an apartment with a chamber and a hall.
sentences.chinese: 我想租一間小套房或是一房一廳的公寓。

sentences.english: My place is a one-bedroom apartment in Brooklyn.
sentences.chinese: 我的家是一間在布魯克林的一房一廳公寓。

definition: standard (hotel) room/two-person room of standard size and amenities/abbr. to 标间
